"He's standing right over there." Rizopas pointed across the room to the one
that was punching the walls.

"Kluster, answer me!" Deemos screamed into the commlink to Kluster.

"Screw Gangon, I say we go without him! The Preds are probably healed up by
now." Deemos said angrily...
